#summary Description of parameters

==General parameters==

===Obligatory parameters=== 

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *See also* || 
|| index || Location of the Lemur/Indri index || ||
|| model || association finding model. Possible values: <br> `1` (Model 1), `2` (Model 2) || ||

  * *associationFile*: file with document-entity associations. This can be generated from the collection, see GeneratingAssociations for details.
  * *associationFileFormat*: format of the association file. Possible values
    * 0 (default): `DOCNO EntityID`
    * 1: `DOCNO EntityID weight`
    * 2: `DOCNO EntityAlias`
    * 3: `DOCNO EntityAlias weight`
  * *entityAliasMapping*: obligatory, when associationFileFormat is set to 2 or 3. This file defines a mapping of `EntityAlias` values to `EntityID`-s. See EntityRepresentation for details.

===Optional parameters===

  * smoothingMethod
  * smoothingParam
  * assocFile
  * queryFile
  * runID
  * outputFile
  * resultNum

Notes:
  * `DOCNO` denotes the external document ID 
  * `" "` (space) denotes whitespace
  * `weight` is a non-negative numeric value (integer or real)
...
